import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Header, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { setRace } from '../../redux/actions' export default function HomePage() { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(setRace('')) }) return (
WELCOME TO THE THORGE
(A character forge made by Thor Hlavaty)

) }
